11.content: It was a bright summer day and how reasonable enough, it was the last day of school. As the bell rang thus sending a stampede of students swarming out of the classrooms, Amanda was walking on campus by herself. It wasn't unusual for her, but it started to get tiresome for some reason. And who could blame her? Sure she had great friends but never a boyfriend. She would try to get one from time to time, but every time she would attempt they were already taken by another. Not even the geeks would ask her out! And at that moment it was almost to much for her to take. Her legs began to quiver. Threatening to send her collapsing to the ground and be helpless but to make a scene. But she shook it off, determined to not do such things and hurt her pride. She was halfway to her house when in the corner of her eye she spotted something glimmering in the bushes. Curious, she decided to investigate it. Picking the shiny object up, it was confirmed that it was some sort of amulet. Its gold shimmer captured her eyes in fascination. "Why would a thing like this be here?" Examining the front and back she found some inscribed text on it. "Loves aspiration.... sounds nifty." Figuring it would be a good decoration for her room, she put it in her pocket and proceeded home. But on the way her mind was caught up in the amulet's text. She couldn't leave it be. "Sounds so romantic. I wish i had someone that had such feelings for me." Unknown to her, she was about to get her wish granted very soon.

Thanks to her parental touch, you've gotten used to calling her "mommy" and you can only call your 43-year-old father, Greg, "dad" having not spent too much time with him as he is usually gone for work.

You figure that you'd just ignore your feelings and it would become easier once you graduate and move away from home to college, but now you've stumbled upon this strange amulet that claims to be able to make anyone your wife. 1131111.content:
For all you know, this amulet could just be a joke, in which case, no harm done. Yet, you have a strange feeling that it's real. With the amulet around your neck, you visit the kitchen where your mother is currently cooking beef stew for dinner.

"Uh...hey, mommy?" you call out awkwardly.

Angeline hums questioningly and turns momentarily away from the stove to look at you. She gives a warm smile.

"What is it, sweetie?" she asks.

You pause, wondering what you have to do to activate the amulet's powers.

'Maybe I just...will it?' you think. With not much guidance to go on, you sigh and wish your mother is your wife.

To your shock, the amulet flashes brightly. You almost panic and try to take it off, but you remember your objective. Sticking to your guns, the amulet grows brighter until your view is completely filled in white. Slowly but surely, everything fades to dark and you feel your consciousness drifting away.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------

You wake up with a gasp. Sitting up, you realize you fell unconscious and look around. You find yourself resting on the living room couch and before your feet, lies your mother who jumps at your sudden alertness. Seeing that you're awake, Angeline grows concern.

"Oh honey, you're awake. You scared me when you fell unconscious! Are you okay?"

Honey...? That's a term that she only uses with your father! Of course, you had to confirm it directly with her as well. You just hope that you don't seem crazy to your mother.

"Um...I'm okay, but...are you my...wife?" you ask, hesitantly.

Angeline blinks a few times and chuckles. "That's a silly question, Andy. I'm your..."
1131111.title: A change in status.

choices: Greg is still your father. There are two husbands!
11311111.content:
"That's a silly question, Andy. I'm your mother and wife!" she proclaims.

You gasp, unable to believe it, yet there aren't any signs that your mother is lying or playing with you. There isn't a sign this is a dream either.

Recomposing yourself, you chuckle as casually as you can.

"Sorry, of course. I...probably hit my head a little. I know this seems strange, but...do you want me to call you Angeline or...m-mommy?"

Angeline raises her eyebrows, finding it hard to believe but she goes along with your cluelessness.

"Mommy, sweetie. I'm your mother before being your wife, after all," she reminds. She then curls her lips and furrows her eyes in concern, "Are you sure you're alright?"

You nod, but you aren't done with your questions yet. You need to get a feel for the state of your family, after all. If she's still your mother, then what happened to Greg?

"...and Greg?" you ask hesitantly.

Angeline sighs at your lack of knowledge but answers anyway.

Aya smiled up at you. "I guess that, if we are stuck being married, we may as well enjoy it." She looked around the bedroom. Much of what had be her furniture was there, and when she saw the mirror she smiled. "Tell me, do you believe that the wife should stay at home, keep the house and have babies?"

You blushed, "Well, yes. That is the way it should be."

Aya grinned, "And would you like to have lots of children."

You smile sheepishly, "Um, yeah. I always thought that I would like to have a big family."

She giggled, "Great! Me too! At least, I will want to." She walked over to the mirror, "Some here. Look at us together."

You walk over and stand next to her. You are tall, and tower over your tiny Asian wife. You put your arm around her. "I am glad you are accepting this so well. I promise to take good care of you and our children."

She grinned in a strange way, "Oh, that is a promise you will partly keep. But it is I who will be taking care of you." With that, she mumbled some strange words, and suddenly things were spinning to where you couldn't feel your own body! Finally, it ended, but when it did, something felt very wrong. When your vision cleared, you gasped, but in a very feminine gasp, because as you looked into the mirror, you saw Aya looking back at you. Right back at you, as in eye to eye, and her movements matched yours! Even more, you had to look 'up' to see your face! You turned, and it was your body standing next to you. You were in Aya's body! You had to look way up to say, "What have you done to us? How did you do this?"

Aya, in your body, took your hand and moved you to the side of the room. "This is the mirror of change. It allowed me to swap bodies with you. So now, you are the wife. And when we have all those children you want, you will be the one to get pregnant. You will carry them in your body. And you will have the privilege of going into painful labor as you push a baby of of that little hole between your legs. It will be lots of fun! Well, for me, as I watch."

You stomp your foot, "I will NOT have your babies. That is the woman's job! I mean the wife! I mean, YOUR job! Now change us back!"

He laughs, "Silly girl, it is YOUR job from now on." And with that he reached over and threw the mirror to the floor. You gasped as it shattered into a million pieces! "You see? You ARE a woman, and my wife, for the rest of your life. There is no going back. You have the eggs and I have the sperm. You wanted to be married to me, well you are. You wanted to have a big family? Well, now you will, only just not quite the way you expected, since now you are the wife. Welcome home Aya."

The weight of his words sank in. How could this happen? You were now a petite, Japanese woman for the rest of your life. You are Aya now. And you were married to your own male body! There had to be a way out! If there was this much magic in the world, there must be something else out there that could fix it! But for now at least, you were truly stuck! Suddenly, the thought of having children was not so exciting!

Twist on Amulet of Marriage, the Amulet of Maternal Desire grants the power to make any woman or fictional character your mother. The new mother will gain fake memories to match your expectation and reality will change to acknowledge the relationship. Of course, matching expectation means that it also takes into account your sexual needs, something of which will be acknowledged by everyone around, no matter how wrong it is.

The amulet can only work on a woman one at a time and their memories and perception will persist until you switch to a new mother. It will also work on your real mother, allowing you to indulge in her as you wish or simply revert back to your original life.

Picking a new mother and how reality will change depends on the person. If a celebrity is picked through your sheer will, that celebrity may be transported near you or you may be transported near her. There is no telling how the amulet will adjust livelihood.

In the case of a fictional character, say...Jessica Rabbit, the character will appear as is in real life with no change in appearance or transformation, essentially like the world of Roger Rabbit. The result may seem strange at first, but you are able to touch and feel a possible 2d character like any other 3d being.

1521.content:
Your name is Alex, walking home from your high school to your home solemnly. The day is just as any other and the most you can find exciting in your life is to be able to get your driver's license soon. Other than that, you have average grades and you've already been accepted to a good enough university that your other friends have also been admitted to. Despite being admitted, you are undecided about what major you want.

Like any other male teenage boy, you jack off in the privacy of your room, play video games, and procrastinate a lot. Yet, something occurs in your uneventful life which makes you stop. In front of you on the sidewalk is an amulet that's attached to a necklace. Curious, you bend over and pick it up. It's a round golden object with some small inscriptions:

"Whoever holds this amulet...shall feel a mother's love of their choosing..." you read out loud before furrowing your eyebrows and then shrugging, putting you in your pocket. You think about what the amulet means. Powers? It's obviously just a joke.

Still, you wonder about the possibilities. Does it mean that you can gain a new mother of your choosing? That's strange, but a little awesome if that were the case. Your mother is kind of annoying and isn't particularly special. If anything, you are just happy that she doesn't bother you too much compared to other mothers according to your friends.

As you think of a dream mother you'd want, you find yourself thinking of...

15211.content:
If you had to pick someone as a mother, it may as well be someone you admired. Your English teacher, Mary is that person who you had daydreamed once or twice, even jacked off.

Of course, you'd rather have her as a lover, but she already had a boyfriend which disappoints many boys in your class.

Depressed all of a sudden, you sigh and before you know it, you arrived home. Feeling at least relieved that you'd have some time to relax and maybe even masturbate thinking about Ms. Mary, you open the door and call out.

"I'm home!"

"Welcome home baby!"

Hearing the sounds of the television reverberating through the living room, you figure she's watching one of her soap operas. It may have been your imagination though, but your usual mother sounded different.

"Are you okay mom? You sound a little off."

In fact, she sounded like someone particular.

"I'm...fine?" your mother responds, confused by your statement.
